mapper.select: /* selectUserCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_EM_COMP TEC INNER JOIN T_EM_DEPT TED ON TEC.COMP_SEQ = TED.COMP_SEQ AND TEC.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TED.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP TEE ON TED.DEPT_SEQ = TEE.DEPT_SEQ AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = TEE.EMP_SEQ AND TEE.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP_MAPPING TEEM ON TEC.COMP_SEQ = TEEM.COMP_SEQ AND TED.DEPT_SEQ = TEEM.DEPT_SEQ AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = TEEM.EMP_SEQ AND TEEM.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP_ACCOUNT TEEA ON TEEM.EMP_SEQ = TEEA.EMP_SEQ AND TEEA.USE_YND = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND TEC.COMP_SEQ = #{user.userCompSeq} AND TED.DEPT_SEQ = #{user.userDeptSeq} AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = #{user.userSeq}

/* selectCalendar */ SELECT IFNULL(TSC.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TITLE, '') AS calTitle, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_CONTENT, '') AS calContent, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_COLOR, '') AS calColor, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TYPE, '') AS calType, IFNULL(TSC.USE_YND, '') AS useYnd, DATE_FORMAT(TSC.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSC.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TSC.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSC.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TSC.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_SC_CAL TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ = #{calendar.calSeq} AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'

/* selectOwner */ SELECT IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_SEQ, '') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_TYPE, '') AS cdeType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE, '') AS calPartitionType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_AUTHORITY, '') AS calAuthority, IFNULL(TSCU.USE_YND, '') AS useYnd, DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSCU.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TSCU.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TSCU.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_SC_CAL_USER TSCU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSCU.CAL_SEQ = #{calendar.calSeq} AND TSCU.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE = 100

/* selectManagers */ SELECT IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_SEQ, '') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_TYPE, '') AS cdeType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE, '') AS calPartitionType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_AUTHORITY, '') AS calAuthority, IFNULL(TSCU.USE_YND, '') AS useYnd, DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSCU.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TSCU.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TSCU.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_SC_CAL_USER TSCU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSCU.CAL_SEQ = #{calendar.calSeq} AND TSCU.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE = 200
